title: An Homage to Rito
body:
Just a bit of screwing around, feel free to ignore.

---

The Developers, which art in Los Angeles,
Rito be thy name,
Thy game be fun,
Thy will be done,
On Earth, as in Runeterra.
Give us this day our daily wins,
Forgive us our trolling,
As we forgive those who troll against us,
And lead us not into temptation,
But deliver us from Bronze.
For thine is the servers,
The power, the ping.
Until you go bankrupt,
GG EZ

---
